author: crossley
msg: Note the removal of the copies of the DTDs.

author: crossley
msg: Add an XML version of the plain-text TR9401 catalog, for xml editors that
cannot use the latter. Still under development.

author: crossley
msg: Reflect the recent changes in the "catalog-demo" sample.

author: crossley
msg: There is no need to copy the DTDs during the build. Since the advent of the
entity resolver, we have not used the hard-coded system identifiers. So the
copies of DTDs under xdocs/dtd/ are superfluous.
Actually the previous cvs log message was a furphy - the build does not
use Jing for validation of xdocs. Watch the build messages.
